cells.data:
先删除干净所有带有MySQL开头的文件，在苹果系统中用终端进入系统找
然后，安装新版本5.6.2的PKG文件
安装MySQLStarupitem.pkg，可以快速启动服务，否则需要以下步骤：

If you don't use the Startup Item, enter the following command sequence:

     shell> cd /usr/local/mysql
     shell> sudo ./bin/mysqld_safe
     (ENTER YOUR PASSWORD, IF NECESSARY)
     (PRESS CONTROL-Z)
     shell> bg
     (PRESS CONTROL-D OR ENTER "EXIT" TO EXIT THE SHELL)

You should be able to connect to the MySQL server, for example, by
running `/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql'.

或者直接去到: cd /usr/local/mysql/bin,
然后会见到一个mysqld_safe,用sudo命令启动：sudo mysqld_safe;
即可见到服务启动提示：
140916 17:49:02 mysqld_safe Logging to '/usr/local/mysql/data/ThomasdeMacBook-Pro.local.err'.
140916 17:49:02 mysqld_safe Starting mysqld daemon with databases from /usr/local/mysql/data
cd ..
ls
^Z
[1]+  Stopped                 sudo mysqld_safe



安装完成。
